description:
The classic Prince of Persia is now
available for download! Relive this
classic platforming game that is often
heralded as a pioneer of the
platforming genre. This re-release is
faithful to the original game, complete
with the dashing acrobatics of the
Prince that made the original famous.

Traverse sprawling levels, dodge
deadly traps like spikes and
guillotines, clash swords with palace
guards, before facing the evil Grand
Vizier and rescuing the princess. But
be quick: you only have one hour! The
sands of time are flowing...
name: Prince of Persia
